channel.title: Haade
channel.description: Home Assistance Alsace home automation & electronics.

item.title: Discovery of SMLIGHT remote dongles
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
SMLight provides us with a complete range of remote and very complete Zigbee coordinators/dongles, simplified installation, a web interface and all Zigbee2mqtt and ZHA compatible.

I am lucky enough to be able to present to you part of the SMlight range from the Ukrainian manufacturer of Zigbee/Matter coordinators. You’ve certainly heard about it, the company is currently pulling out all the stops in terms of communication and is there anything to listen for?

Read the full article: Discovery of SMLIGHT remote dongles on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Test and integration of the Blebox Doorbox v2 module
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
In this article I will present to you the micro wifi doorbox v2 module from Blebox NO/NC for garage door, gate as well as the integration into the Tedee and Home Assistant application

Following the article on the Tedee GO connected lock. The manufacturer Tedee also provided me with a relay module doorbox v2, it is a NO/NC module from the Blebox brand. Polish manufacturer of micro wifi module, I must admit that they are qualitative and there is rather interest because it [...]

Read the full article: Test and integration of the Blebox Doorbox v2 module on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Sonoff zbmini-l2 test taken to the extreme
item.dc:creator: Nico
August
item.description:
Test of the Sonoff Zbmini-L2 like you've never seen it, guaranteed 100,000 clicks, that's what we're going to see

Here’s a video where you might have a laugh, with the band August and Lulu we all 3 decided to test the Sonoff Zbmini-L2 in a most extreme way by pushing it back to its limits.

Read the full article: Sonoff zbmini-l2 test taken to the extreme on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Change the result of an entity's state attribute
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
In this mini tutorial I will show you how to change the entity state attribute result to another using templates in Home-Assistant

In the previous article I showed you how to create an average of states on entities, by making a call on an entity state states() which directly reports the state of this entity. Today is different, I’m going to show you how to work with entity state attributes.

Read the full article: Change the result of an entity's state attribute on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Video comparison of Moes, Aqara and Sonoff thermostatic faucets
item.dc:creator: Nico
August
item.description:
August presents a test on our Haade-lab youtube channel, a comparison of Moes ZTRV-BY-100, Aqara SRTS-A01 and Sonoff TRVZB thermostatic faucets

Following the video saving heating thanks to home automation it works, August returns with a comparison of thermostatic faucets Moes ZTRV-BY-100, Aqara SRTS-A01 and Sonoff TRVZB, interestingly his vision as a novice will offer an interesting experience to those who want to discover the world of home automation, all without [...]

Read the full article: Video comparison of Moes, Aqara and Sonoff thermostatic faucets on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Test of the Tedee Go connected lock + accessories
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Complete test and integration into the home-assistant of the Tedee Go lock with the Tedee wifi bridge and the Tedee access code keyboard

A first for Haade, I’m going to present to you a connected lock made in Eastern countries, the Tedee Go with the Tedee bridge which goes well and finally, the Tedee digicode. For the record, I asked Tedee to provide me with the Pro version which looks more attractive, but [...]

Read the full article: Test of the Tedee Go connected lock + accessories on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Template - Create an average on entities
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
mini tutorials on templates in home assistant, how to create an average of the state of several entities.

For our first template tutorial, I suggest you create averages from the state of the values of the entities (sensor). In my cases I need to take an average of two values concerning the off-peak/peak time teleinformation in order to bring up a single common value. In addition it is [...]

Read the full article: Template - Create an average on entities on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Testing the new Nodon SIN-4-FP-21 heating module
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
I will test this nodon pilot wire module and above all show you how to integrate and control it in home assistant with the thermostat interface

A new arrival on the market for radiator control by pilot wire, the Nodon SIN-4-FP-21, faithful to the manufacturing quality of the brand, promises simplified management of radiators with management by pilot wire.

Read the full article: Testing the new Nodon SIN-4-FP-21 heating module on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Nspanel Pro 3.0 Rubik Design Update
item.dc:creator: Nico
item.description:
Presentation of Rubik the new user interface of Nspanel Pro for a new experience takes areas of Rubik's cube.

Sonoff evolves the user interface (UI) of NSPanel Pro, version 3.0.0 integrates Rubik an interface module which opens up the fields of possibility for you. The company continues to upgrade the firmware of Zigbee modules, and this proves that this company is serious.

Read the full article: Nspanel Pro 3.0 Rubik Design Update on the blog Haade.fr.

item.title: Save on heating thanks to home automation, it works!
item.dc:creator: Nico
August
item.description:
As part of a new video concept presented by August on YouTube, I will detail the installation of a home gas boiler.

This is an article dedicated to the home automation of a traditional gas boiler with radiators connected to water circuits. Home automation will bring you comfort, financial savings and foolproof adaptability. This article is written to complement the video shot by August and Lulu on the subject. Two friends who [...]

Read the full article: Save on heating thanks to home automation, it works! on the blog Haade.fr.
